actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-103.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 136.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadlines under the Federal Power Act applicable to two hydroelectric projects in Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of specified licensees, to extend until April 15, 2001, the time required to commence construction of certain hydroelectric projects in Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadlines under the Federal Power Act applicable to two hydroelectric projects in Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
